definitions.text: the slender part of the back
a garment size for a small person
limited or below average in number or quantity or magnitude or extent

examples: a newspaper with a modest circulation
what a big little boy you are

definitions.text: slight or limited; especially in degree or intensity or scope
examples: a series of death struggles with small time in between

definitions.text: low or inferior in station or quality
examples: a modest man of the people
e.e.cummings's poetry is written all in minuscule letters

definitions.text: have fine or very small constituent particles
not large but sufficient in size or amount
examples: helped in my own small way

definitions.text: made to seem smaller or less (especially in worth)
examples: her comments made me feel small
